character.name: Ruhig
character.desc:
<c=6868b9>Ruhig</c> 
Your ... wait, who is this person? Ruhig specializes in supporting their teammates and utilizing the hull as its own reasource. Try not to self destruct please.

DraconicPower.name: DRACONINC POWER
DraconicPower.desc: When you lose hull, gain 2 <c=status>overdrive</c> <c=downside>and reduce this status amount by 1.</c>

DraconicScales.name: DRACONINC SCALES
DraconicScales.desc: When you lose hull, Gain 2 <c=status>max shield</c> & 1 <c=status>shield</c> <c=downside>and reduce this status amount by 1.</c>

DraconicScalesB.name: DRACONINC SCALES B
DraconicScalesB.desc: When you lose hull, Gain 3 <c=status>max shield</c> <c=downside>and reduce this status amount by 1.</c>

DraconicShards.name: DRACONIC SHARDS
DraconicShards.desc: When you lose hull, Gain 3 <c=status>max shards</c> & 3 <c=status>shards</c> <c=downside>and reduce this status amount by 1.</c>

DraconicShardsB.name: DRACONIC SHARDS B
DraconicShardsB.desc: When you lose hull, Gain 3 <c=status>max shield</c> & 99 <c=status>max shards</c> <c=downside>and reduce this status amount by 1.</c>

NeedForSpeed.name: NEED FOR SPEED
NeedForSpeed.desc: When you lose hull, Gain 2 <c=status>evade</c> <c=downside>and reduce this status amount by 1.</c>

Paitence.name: PAITENCE
Paitence.desc: When you lose hull, Gain 3 <c=status>serenity</c> <c=downside>and reduce this status amount by 1.</c>

Wrath.name: WRATH
Wrath.desc: When you lose hull, Gain <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>heat</c> per <c=status>heat</c> you have <c=downside>and remove this status.</c>

Zoning.name: ZONING
Zoning.desc: When you lose hull, Gain 2 <c=status>droneshift</c> then launch an <c=midrow>attack drone</c> followed by an <c=midrow>astroid</c> to the left & right of the <c=midrow>attack drone</c> <c=downside>and reduce this status amount by 1.</c>

ZoningA.name: ZONING A
ZoningA.desc: When you lose hull, Gain 2 <c=status>droneshift</c> then launch a <c=midrow>attack drone MK II</c> followed by 2 <c=midrow>astroids</c> to both the left & right of the <c=midrow>attack drone</c> <c=downside>and reduce this status amount by 1.</c>

ZoningB.name: ZONING B
ZoningB.desc: When you lose hull, Gain 2 <c=status>droneshift</c> then launch an <c=midrow>attack drone</c> followed by 2 <c=midrow>spacemines</c> to both the left & right of the <c=midrow>attack drone</c> <c=downside>and reduce this status amount by 1.</c>

TrueGrit.name: TRUE GRIT
TrueGrit.desc: When you lose hull, draw 2 cards and gain 1 <c=energy>energy</c> per <c=status>true grit</c> you have.

AGainPaitenceWrath.title: Gain Paitence/Wrath
AGainPaitenceWrath.draw: Add Paitence/Wrath to your deck & remove this card from your deck.

RuhigsAdaptability.title: Ruhig's Adaptability
RuhigsAdaptability.desc: You may flip this card to exhaust from play for free.

SelfDestruct.title: Single-Use
SelfDestruct.desc: This card will remove itself from your deck when this option is selected.

RushDownANew.title: Damage Calculation:
RushDownANew.desc: Take the add your evade and heat then divide by 2.
RushDownANew.draw: Take the sum of your evade and heat then divide by 2.
RushDownANew.discard: Take the sum of your evade and heat then divide by 2.

RuhigSupportA.title: Ruhig Support A
RuhigSupportA.desc: Gain 1 of 6 support cards, but they have the A upgrade.

RuhigSupportB.title: Ruhig Support B
RuhigSupportB.desc: Gain 1 of 6 support cards, but they have the B upgrade.

ADraconicPowerCalc.title: Damage Calculation:
ADraconicPowerCalc.desc: Divide your shield by 5 then round down.
ADraconicPowerCalc.draw: Divide your shield by 5 then round down.
ADraconicPowerCalc.discard: Divide your shield by 5 then round down.
ADraconicPowerCalc.CalcSpr: Divide your shield by 5 then round down.

RuhigSupportDouble.title: Double Ruhig Support
RuhigSupportDouble.desc: Gain 1 of 6 support cards, then gain another 1 of 6 support cards.

hurt.title: HULL DAMAGE TRIGGER
hurt.desc: Trigger anything that requires you to lose 1 hull.

SpareParts.name: Spare Parts
SpareParts.descB: Heal for <c=heal>{0}</c> hull. <c=downside>Must have played <c=keyword>{1}</c> cards this turn.</c>{2}

AvidReaderCopy.name: Avid Reader Copy
AvidReaderCopy.desc: Heal for <c=damage>{0}</c> hull. <c=downside>Must have played <c=keyword>{1}</c> cards this turn.</c>{2}

RuhigsChallenge.name: Ruhig's Challenge
RuhigsChallenge.descNone: <c=heal>Heal: {3}</c>. Attack: <c=damage>{0}</c>. <c=downside>Must lose <c=keyword>{1}</c> hull this turn to play.</c>{2}
RuhigsChallenge.descA: <c=heal>Heal: 2</c>. Attack: <c=damage>{0}</c>. <c=downside>Must lose <c=keyword>{1}</c> hull this turn to play.</c>{2}
RuhigsChallenge.descB: <c=heal>Heal: 4</c>. Attack: <c=damage>{0}</c>. <c=downside>Must lose <c=keyword>{1}</c> hull this turn to play.</c>{2}

RuhigCycleMaster.name: Ruhig: Cycle Master
RuhigCycleMaster.descNone: Once per turn, gain 1 stack when you shuffle. Attack = stacks. (<c=damage>{0}</c>)
RuhigCycleMaster.descA: Once per turn, gain 1 stack when you shuffle. Attack = stacks. (<c=damage>{0}</c>)
RuhigCycleMaster.descB: Twice per turn, gain 1 stack when you shuffle. Attack = stacks.(<c=damage>{0}</c>)

HullAddOn.name: HULL ADD ON
HullAddOn.desc: Permanently gain +5 max hull and heal 2 hull.

RuhigsRepairKit.name: RUHIG'S REPAIR KIT
RuhigsRepairKit.desc: Gain 50% extra healing when you heal, rounded down.

HullBlink.name: Hull Blink
HullBlink.desc: Literally imagine you get the bruise effect for free at the start of each of your turns (just in reverse order).

HeavyHull.name: HEAVY HULL
HeavyHull.desc: Start with 2 Engine Stall Each Turn. Gain 15 max hull & 5 max shield. Heal 5.

HullArtifacts.name: HULL ARTIFACTS
HullArtifacts.desc: Sacrifice 25% of your max hull for 2 boss artifacts.

HullGraft.name: HULL GRAFT
HullGraft.desc: Gain 1 max hull at the end of each combat.

MeldHull.name: MELD HULL
MeldHull.desc: Once per combat, heal 1 when you have lost 2 hull during one of your turns.

HealthPotion.name: HEALTH POTION
HealthPotion.desc: Heal half of your ship's hull rounded down.
